title: PM pays tributes to Shaheed Benazir Bhutto
content:
ISLAMABAD, Jun 21 (APP): Prime Minister Muhammad Shehbaz Sharif Tuesday paid rich tributes to Shaheed Benazir Bhutto and said the void created by her martyrdom would never be filled.
On his Twitter handle, the prime minister on her 69th birthday said that democracy without her was poorer.
Praying for her eternal peace, he further recollected that the former prime minister fearlessly and staunchly advocated the causes, she believed in.
